title: Cafetin Cua
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Juice bar, Beer/Wine, Take-out, Nicaraguan, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. American owned and operated, offers several vegan dishes and ones that can be made vegan. Pasta, sandwiches, salads, fresh juices, all day breakfast, and Nicaraguan dishes with a twist. Food is made to order. Directions: from the clock tower, two blocks north and 3/4 block west..
